resources.string: com.goodwy.dialer
Right Dialer

Compatibility updates for Android 15 & 16
 Changed the logic of styles
 Changed behavior of missed notifications
 Changed colors of context action modes
 Added actions to call notification
 The ‘Keep calls in notifications’ option has been changed. Now, if the headset is not connected, the speaker will be turned on
 Fixed a limitation on the number of recent calls
 Fixed flash notification
 Fixed bugs, improved stability
Fixed the call screen background\n Fixed the colors for recent calls\n Fixed bugs, improved stability

Changed color schemes and theme behavior
 Added an auto dark/light theme
 Optimized call history loading
 Added voice input for search
 Added bottom padding setting for dialpad
 Added ‘Shows contact's nicknames (when available) instead of their first names’ option
 Added ‘Block Calls’ setting and quick settings tile
 Added ‘Blocking type’ option
 The operation of blocking unknown numbers has been changed
 Added the ability to disable one of the swipes
 Added dialpad tone in TalkBack mode
 The dialpad searches in contacts, and if it doesn't find anything, it searches in recent calls
 A new call type has been added - Blocked Call
 Added date format YYYY.MM.DD
 Persian calendar added
 Dialpad search has been fixed
 Fixed bugs, improved stability

Added ‘Keep calls in notifications’ option
 Added call status ‘Busy’
 Improved translation
 Fixed bugs, improved stability
Added Arabic as a second language option for the T9 search functionality\n Added option to use an accent color\n Bug fixes
Changed behavior of the search bar\n Fixed input of secret codes\n Bug fixes
Accelerated and optimized the call detail screen\n Fixed avatar display for companies\n Improved performance, bug fixes
Added name caching in call logs\n Improved performance, bug fixes
Added ‘Show the number blocking button’ option\n Fixed locked screen on incoming call\n Bug fixes
Fixed missed call notification errors
Added ‘Pressing back ends the call’ option\n Fixed input of secret codes\n Bug fixes
Fixed and sped up the call screen
Bug fixes

Accelerated the call screen
 Added ‘Search the web’ menu item
 Added the ability to restart a reminder to call you back
 Bug fixes

Changed theme logic
 Added ‘App icon color’ option
 Add dynamic shortcuts for starred contacts
 Added support for missed call notifications
 Added display of information about missed calls on the app icon
 Adapted for small screen devices
 Added ‘Dialer font’ option
 Added call notes
 Improved scrolling performance and interface
 Improved performance, bug fixes

Increased the number of cached recent calls
 Added ‘SIM card selection dialogue style’ option
 Added ‘End search when changing tab’ option
 Added ‘Change the colour of the top bar when scrolling’ option
 Fixed bugs

Changed swipe behaviour and added animation
 Reduced the contact icon when viewing call details
 Fixed again incorrect display of SIM card number in some cases
 Fixed button layout on the call details screen
 Fixed bugs
Fixed display of time in call details\n Fixed incorrect display of SIM card number in some cases\n Fixed bugs

Added option to select an additional language on the keyboard
 Changed haptic feedback behavior when swiping
 Fixed incorrect call end error
 Fixed incorrect display of SIM card number in some cases
 Fixed bugs

Added ability to change quick answers to a call
 Added option to speed dial to select voicemail
 Changed the depth of swipes
 Fixed bugs, improved stability

Added an indicator for using high-resolution audio when making a call
 Added VoLTE display in call details
 Increased contact icon when viewing call details
 Improved detailing of standard contact icons
 Fixed incorrect display of SIM card number in some cases
 Fixed bugs, improved stability

Improved interaction with TalkBack
 Added customization of button position during a call
 Added ability to display recent calls on the dialpad screen
 Added ability to customize avatars size
 Added support for emoji in contact name
 Added option to group recent calls
 Added option to set maximum number of recent calls to be displayed
 Added ability to block outgoing calls from other applications
 The proximity sensor is activated on an incoming call only after the call is answered
 Fixed errors when receiving a second call and when managing calls
 Fixed many bugs
Improved SIM card selection dialog\n Fixed bugs, improved stability
Added swipe gestures (call, message, block, delete)\n Tone volume setting added\n Bug fixes
Fixed bugs, improved stability
Improved interface\n Fixed bugs, improved stability

Added sorting options
 Changed speed dialing, you can now add numbers from outside your contacts
 Added the ability to put pause and wait signs (, and ;) to the dialpad
 Fixed bugs, improved stability
